name: MIRRORTALK
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: MIRROR TALK brings you conversations about life, love, self and other interesting topics that affect us. We intend to create an avenue to reflect on our decisions, experiences and everything that has ever come across our way. This podcast is inspired by different conversations, stories, write-ups, I have had the opportunity to be a part of. Mirror Talk is a medium for us to talk about these relatable stories, topics and a lot more. Let us talk, so join the conversation, kindly stay tuned and become a part of our family. Always remember that you are strong, enough, capable and you are loved!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
